title: Initial Release
summary: First production release of Investron — a full-stack investing research platform with watchlist management, stock analysis, and in-app documentation.

sections.label: New Features
items: Full-stack investing research application with watchlist, stock detail views, and financial metrics
In-app documentation page with project overview and architecture details
Railway backend deployment with Procfile support

sections.label: Enhancements
items: Concurrent watchlist price fetching — prices for all tickers load in parallel instead of sequentially
yfinance calls offloaded to thread pool to avoid blocking the async event loop
Rate limiter tuned to allow small burst (5 requests / 2 seconds) for concurrent watchlist loads
Full-width layout for header and main content area

sections.label: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed yfinance failing on cloud servers by adding curl_cffi with browser impersonation
Fixed CORS_ORIGINS environment variable parsing for comma-separated origins
Fixed TypeScript build errors for Vercel deployment
